title: Quick Take: Attack in France; Trump Delays, Picks Pence
description: More than 80 people are dead after a man driving a truck crashed through a crowd of people celebrating Bastile Day in Nice, France. Donald Trump quickly said he would delay announcing his running mate, then did announce his running mate, Indiana Governor Mike Pence. This episode, host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
